basic.floral_language:
Fuchsia triphylla
Floriography: beautiful, unique, peculiar
Fuchsia triphylla also called "lantern flower" in China for its lantern-shaped flowers.
Fuchsia triphylla has elegantly erect stems and dark green oval leaves, pendulous lantern or bell shape flowers. Suitable for flower beds or balcony and yard decoration.
Fuchsia triphylla like the warm sunlight, avoid summer direct sunlight by placing in half shaded places. Blossom season in April-December for 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-December, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes moderate sunlight, in summer use half shade for better care
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
